slide.title: Timezones Utilities
slide.subtitle: Transition Times and Location Information
slide.example:
<?php
	$tz = timezone_open("America/Caracas");
	$trs = $tz->getTransitions();
	// new in PHP 5.3:
	$trs = $tz->getTransitions(strtotime('1960-01-01 UTC'));

	echo "<pre>\n";
	foreach ($trs as $tr) {
		printf("%20s %7d %d %s\n",
			$tr['time'], $tr['offset'], $tr['isdst'], $tr['abbr']);
	}

	// new in PHP 5.3:
	$loc = $tz->getLocation();
	echo 'Info: ', join( ' - ', $loc ), "\n";
